short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best way to get motivated and discover new inspiration in your browser - create a healthy mindset with affirmations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you in need of inspiration to boost your self-confidence and motivation? Look no further than the A Space To Remember (ASTR) platform! 

Leverage our expanding platform to experience inspiration that is tailored to you by utilising our features and ever-growing catalogue of inspirational affirmations or create your personalised space. Each tab on our platform is powered by our affirmation catalogue, providing you with daily motivation that you can easily like and share with others. 

By using our browser companion, you can ensure that your motivation moves with you throughout the day in your browser. Plus, our affirmation catalogue is always expanding, and we're constantly adding new features to our platform and browser companion to help you stay inspired, achieve your goals and stay motivated.

Together, let's create a space for you to remember and find the inspiration you need to achieve your dreams!

✨ Features:
  • Easy sign-in with SSO or magic link
  • Create a healthy mindset and life
  • Get access to ALL public affirmations on the ASTR platform
  • Clean Interface
  • Manual shuffle through affirmations
  • Easily share links with friends, loved ones, and colleagues
  • Easily open affirmations in the web app for more options
  • Easily share feedback with us *
  • Easily access your liked affirmations *
  • Like your favourite affirmation and access across the ASTR eco-system *
  • Easily change your affirmation perspective *
  • Choose your preferred captivating theme for the affirmations card *

* Must be signed in to your FREE account to enable 


Privacy Policy:

https://astr.life/privacy-policy/
